description:
One of the reasons Tim Walz did Kamala no favors in the election is that he blatantly makes things up without providing any evidence, while also failing to portray Trump as an evil villain. However, he never learned from that and is doubling down, as he now claims Trump will segregate students if he gets his way with the Department of Education.

NEW: Tim Walz says Trump’s plan to dismantle the Department of Education could take America back to an era of racial segregation.

“And then it’s about the Civil Rights Department at the Department of Education that makes sure that we don’t have a situation where a Ruby Bridges… pic.twitter.com/zI46hbmGhk
— The Vigilant Fox 🦊 (@VigilantFox)
title: Tampon Tim Walz: Trump shutting down the Department of Education is totally the same as segregating schools

description:
A NYC woman fell flat on her face after harassing and chasing a man solely because she did not like his MAGA hat. And to say karma was served in that instance would be an understatement.

Unhinged NYC woman loses it on a man in a MAGA hat—then karma knocks her down, literally.🤣🤣🤣 pic.twitter.com/aFgrAyxMLC
— I Meme Therefore I Am 🇺🇸 (@ImMeme0) March 21, 2025

In the background, you can hear a man claiming “This is why your side lost.” And this really does explain it. These people are not interested in uniting the country or hearing the oth
title: Unhinged woman chases after man in MAGA hat, then finds out about gravity and karma the hard way

description:
While there was no need ever to use the word “Latinx,” given that “Latin” is already gender neutral, the left still decided to take up that language battle. And although Gavin Newsom most certainly used this word, that does not currently align with his attempt to position himself away from the woke left. Nonetheless, he’s not deceiving anyone, as his actions speak louder than words. And in this case, his words are his actions and we have the receipts.

Gavin Newsom used the term “Latinx” several times, despite claiming no one in his office ever did so.\

THIS IS BRUTAL! Gavin Newsom claimed on his podcast that no one in his office ever used the word "Latinx" to describe Latinos, so CNN aired a compilation of Newsom himself saying it REPEATEDLY.

It's amazin
title: Gavin Newsom's lies about never saying "Latinx" were so brazen even CNN - yes, THAT CNN - called him out on it
